```{python}
import pandas as pd
import plotly.express as px
from inspect_viz.data import datatable
from inspect_viz.widgets import figure_view, table_view, menu_input
iris = datatable(px.data.iris())
```

```{python}
menu_input(iris, column="species")
```

```{python}
fig = px.scatter(iris, x="sepal_width", y="sepal_length")
figure_view(iris, fig)
```

```{python}
table_view(iris)
```
